comment: She is a great professor. Very passionate. Loves her job. Yes she speaks fast and brushes over some things but she is very happy to explain things in detail if asked. I would recommend this professor a thousand times over!

But Shaffer is truly a teacher at heart. 
 Her mind works at the speed of light. Yet, she's humble and doesn't take herself too seriously. If you're willing to put in the work, she'll go above and beyond to help you.

comment: As a professor she was very good and kept class engaging, but if you miss multiple classes it will harm your grade. comment: Shes pretty cool and like.. normal. Not too bad at all. Didn't too much like chemistry but this class made me like it more. Sometimes she does participation but she also goes over HW questions.
